#summary List of libraries here and quick links to relevant source and examples files.
#labels Featured

Below is a list of the libraries being worked on in this project.


== !MarkerManager ==

This is the open-source ActionScript3 version of !MarkerManager, with improvements.

== KMLParser ==

This is an !ActionScript3 port of the dom classes in [http://code.google.com/p/libkml libkml], and only supports elements which can be rendered by the Google Maps API for Flash.
